verses.verseString: In the name of God, the Gracious, the Merciful.
verses.verseStringReplacedWithAllah: In the name of Allah, the Gracious, the Merciful.

verses.verseString: Perish the hands of Abu Lahab, and perish he.
Neither his wealth nor his earnings will avail him.
He will enter a flaming Fire.
And his wife, the carrier of firewood.
Around her neck is a rope of palm fiber.
